com.paypal.selion.platform.mobile.elements

Interface MobileList

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MobileElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UIAList, UiList

    public interface MobileList
extends MobileElement
    MobileList interface allows access to, and control of, elements within a list in your app.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      find the children of list and return count of them.

        set the element that should be searched inside a list

        set the element that should be searched inside a list
        Parameters:
        childBy - the locator for child element

      • scrollToCellAtIndex

        void scrollToCellAtIndex(int index)
        Scrolls to the table cell at the specified index. The index in 0 based.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the cell to scroll to.

      • clickCellAtIndex

        void clickCellAtIndex(int index,
                    Object... expected)
        Clicks the table cell at the specified index. The index in 0 based.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the cell to click.
        expected - Expected entities in the form of objects extending MobileElement or xpath location in the form of String or instances of ExpectedCondition.

      • findElementAtIndex

        org.openqa.selenium.WebElement findElementAtIndex(int index)
        find and return the element at requested index of list
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the cell to click.
        Returns:
        WebElement the element at given index

      • childrenCount

        int childrenCount()
        find the children of list and return count of them. for android, it will return only the count on elements in current view, not the whole list.
        Returns:
        count of children in list.

      • getChildren

        List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> getChildren()
        return list of children that matches the child set (or in ios case default child)
        Returns:
        list of children
